title: THE MOST RELIABLE DONATE WEBSITE
discription: We have worked as a charity for 8 years in all over 100 countries in the world. SA is rated as the most reliable donate web for people who loves animals.

title: SAVE MORE THAN 1000 SPECIES
discription: We saved more than 1000 species, include 100 endangered species.

title: OVER 1 MILLION MEMBERS
discription: We have more than 1 million members in all over the world, always ready to support you.

title: HAVE MORE THAN 200 CAMPUS
discription: With over 200 campus in around the world, we believe our influence in the society.
